game.name: Grapple Dog
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Jump, Swing and Zip your way through colourful worlds and exciting challenges in this unique 2D action-platformer! Master the power of the Grapple on your adventure to save the world!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Jump, Swing and Zip your way through colourful worlds and exciting challenges in this unique 2D action-platformer! Master the power of the Grapple on your adventure to save the world!

reviewHighlights.text: 생각보다 갓겜인데 많이들 안해서 안타까움... 난이도가 쉬운편은 아니지만 무한 목숨과 점프 모드가 있으니 애들도 별 문제없이 깰 수 있음.
